pages.title: What Is It?
pages.text: The Void Heart Is The Product Of Forging Obsidian Together With The Kingsoul. Again, Almost Nothing Is Known About It.

pages.title: How To Use
pages.text: Right-Clicking With It In Your Offhand Will Give You Dusk, Which Cures You Of Radiance. This Is The Only Way To Cure Radiance.
